scheduler.view
Class ViewCourseFilter

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      scheduler.view.ViewCourseFilter

public class ViewCourseFilter
extends java.util.Observable

Class ViewCourseFilter contains a list of CourseFilterObj that determine which courses are displayed in a schedule view.

Author:
Jason Mak (jamak@calpoly.edu)

Field Summary
protected  java.util.ArrayList<CourseFilterObj> courseFilterList
          list of courses and their visibility statuses in a view
protected  ViewTypeFilterUI viewTypeFilterUI
          The panel of courses to be filtered.

setCourseFilter

public void setCourseFilter(int courseNum,
                            boolean visible)
Sets the course to be visible or filtered out. The view is notified to display or hide scheduleItems containing the course.

Parameters:
courseNum - the index of the course in the list of CourseFilterObj
visible - the new visibility state of the course
